title: Erigon stuck at 15537393
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

`erigon version 2022.09.3-stable-32bd69e5`

OS & Version: Linux Ubuntu 20.04, t3.2xlarge, 8 vCPUs, 32 Gb RAM.

Commit hash:  `32bd69e5316050005e34448ec6b0165f97173d50`

#### Expected behaviour

If I start an archive node from block 0 to now it should keep syncing after The Merge block `15537393`.

#### Actual behaviour

Stuck at block `15537393`, but not sure if it's actually ok, maybe it's confirming all blocks until 15537393 at once right before trying to sync the next block after the merge?.

This erigon node was started from scratch, having the lighthouse consensus client connected, and it has been syncing for more than a week. Yesterday it reached The Merge block, but haven't been able to pass that block. 

Might be related to this issue: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/5468 ? I posted a new issue just because my logs are different.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

```
# erigon process
./build/bin/erigon --chain=mainnet --datadir=/data/erigon/datadir --ethash.dagdir=/data/erigon/dagdir \
--private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090 --torrent.download.rate=32mb \
--authrpc.jwtsecret=/home/ubuntu/jwt.hex

# rpc process
./build/bin/rpcdaemon --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090 --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.port=3008 --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3 --http.corsdomain='*' --ws \
--datadir=/data/erigon/datadir

# lighthouse process
./lighthouse beacon_node \
  --network mainnet \
  --execution-jwt /home/ubuntu/jwt.hex \
  --execution-endpoint http://0.0.0.0:8551 \
  --datadir /data/lighthouse
```

#### Backtrace

erigon logs:

__Update:__

I can see that some indexing was performed the last few days: `AccountHistoryIndex`, `StorageHistoryIndex`, `TxLookup`.

```
INFO[09-26|18:27:01.878] [txpool] stat                            block=15537393 pending=9547 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=3.9GB sys=7.6GB
INFO[09-26|18:27:22.441] [11/16 AccountHistoryIndex] Progress     number=14192765 alloc=4.2GB sys=7.6GB

...

INFO[09-26|23:16:01.881] [txpool] stat                            block=15537393 pending=9452 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=5.1GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[09-26|23:16:28.014] [12/16 StorageHistoryIndex] Progress     number=7223728 alloc=5.9GB sys=8.7GB
INFO[09-26|23:16:36.716] Flushed buffer file                      name=/data/erigon/datadir/etl-temp/erigon-sortable-buf-2469462514 alloc=6.1GB sys=8.7GB

...

INFO[09-28|06:44:01.884] [txpool] stat                            block=15537393 pending=9292 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=4.4GB sys=9.3GB
INFO[09-28|06:44:17.113] [14/16 TxLookup] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=BlockTransactionLookup current key=ad36e851... alloc=4.0GB sys=9.3GB
INFO[09-28|06:44:46.921] [14/16 TxLookup] etl: temp files removed total size=3.3GB
```

But now that I don't see any indexing is happening, the node still can't pass The Merge block:

